content: my you are loved hats are worked flat and feature a textured heart in seed / moss stitch they come in 4 sizes newborn 1 to 6 months 6 to 12 months and toddlers and are a perfect gift for valentine s day or any other day you can find the pattern for a **matching vest** here 1 in my blog you will find the entire pattern for **free** no subscription is required i hope you like them and if you have some extra time and yarn these are perfect as charity hats > skill level suitable for beginner > knitters who know how to make > decreases advanced beginners / easy ♥ includes abbreviations tips written and detailed instructions for each size and notes about seaming > basic techniques used > > co cast on k2tog knit 2 stitches > together ssk slip 1 st knit 1 pass > slipped st over p purl k knit > bobble bind off if you have any doubt or need help do not hesitate to write me at ohlalana designs@gmail com or drop me a message here in ravelry i will reply asap thanks for stopping by and happy knitting 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/you-are-loved-baby-vest
